burlap.behavior.singleagent.auxiliary

Class StateGridder.AttributeSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.singleagent.auxiliary.StateGridder.AttributeSpecification
  • Enclosing class:
    StateGridder

    public static class StateGridder.AttributeSpecification
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for specifying the grid along a single attribute. It contains the name of the attribute, the lower value on the grid, the upper value on the grid, and the number of grid points along that space. The grid points will always include the lower grid value and upper grid value, unless the number of grid points is 1.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StateGridder.AttributeSpecification(Attribute att, int numGridPoints)
      Initializes with the lower and upper values of the grid being set to the Attribute objects' full domain (i.e., its Attribute.lowerLim and Attribute.upperLim data members.

      Initializes.

        public StateGridder.AttributeSpecification(java.lang.String attName,
                                   double lowerVal,
                                   double upperVal,
                                   int numGridPoints)
        Initializes. The grid points will always include the lower grid value and upper grid value, unless the number of grid points is 1.
        Parameters:
        attName - The name of the attribute.
        lowerVal - The lower value of the attribute on the gird
        upperVal - The upper value of the attribute on the grid
        numGridPoints - The number of grid points along this attribute

      • StateGridder.AttributeSpecification

        public StateGridder.AttributeSpecification(Attribute att,
                                   int numGridPoints)
        Initializes with the lower and upper values of the grid being set to the Attribute objects' full domain (i.e., its Attribute.lowerLim and Attribute.upperLim data members. The grid points will always include the lower grid value and upper grid value, unless the number of grid points is 1.
        Parameters:
        att - the attribute to grid.
        numGridPoints - the number of grid poitns along this attribute.

    • Method Detail

      • cellWidth

        public double cellWidth()
        Returns the width of a grid cell along this attribute. Returns 0 if the number of grid points is 1. This value is defined as (upperVal - lowerVal) / (numGridPoints - 1)
        Returns:
        the width of a grid cell along this attribute
